properties.label: San Communities Electrification Progamme
properties.html:
San Communities Electrification Progamme

Omaheke, Namibia

tags

image

image credit

Local non-grid electrification project for 90 households and supporting infrastructure. Solar energy will provide for basic electricity needs including lighting, mobile phone charging etc. Solar energy will also be used to revive existing boreholes in the community.
